meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spacious or having ample space.
meanings.sent1: The roominess of the living room made it easy to move around.
meanings.sent2: The new house had a great sense of roominess, with large open areas.
meanings.sent3: The roominess of the closet was so vast that it seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent4: Her mind had a roominess that allowed for endless creativity to flow.
meanings.sent5: The roominess of the field stretched out before us, inviting us to run freely.

meanings.definition: The extent to which a space is able to accommodate people or objects.
meanings.sent1: The roominess of the car allowed for all our luggage to fit comfortably.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's roominess made it perfect for hosting large gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The roominess of the backpack was surprising; it held more than expected.
meanings.sent4: His heart had a roominess that welcomed everyone with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The roominess of the boat ensured everyone had a seat to enjoy the ride.
